website_summaries.verdict: It's designed well and does what it's supposed to do, but users should be aware of a leaking problem.
cons: Some problems with leakage and poor fit after disassembly
Aerator has been known to crack

customer_reviews.title: He didn't think it would do much to the taste of the wine so I had him try some cheapish wine without this aerator and then had
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Dad who really likes his wine. He didn't think it would do much to the taste of the wine so I had him try some cheapish wine without this aerator and then had him try it with the aerator and the taste was like night and day. He's tried it on some of his better wine and while it does change the taste a little, it wasn't as drastic as the improvement on the cheaper wine.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Love this far more than my Venturi
customer_reviews.text: Love this far more than my Venturi! Bought for the boyfriend and going to be ordering one for my house now! Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: runsforchampagne

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware: Plastic stem part cracked after 3 uses, now this wont stay together to use..waste of money. Handwashed each time with extra care Buy another brand not this one!
customer_reviews.author: Chad D.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and flavorful
customer_reviews.text: I never understood the point of aerating wine but this tool makes a difference. When my sister bought a product like this and had me try the wine I couldn't tell the difference at all. I decided to give it another try and poured two glasses of wine, one with aeration and one without, swapped the cups around so I didn't know which was which, and after tasting both there was a clear difference in the quality. Even my boyfriend who isn't much of a wine drinker noticed the difference. I'm not sure what exactly it is, but this aerator basically makes any wine smooth and flavorful.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Turned a skeptic to a believer
customer_reviews.text: As somebody who recently "got into" wine, I was a big skeptic about this product. It seemed gimmicky but the reviews were glowing. Decided to give it a try. It's simple ,easy to take on and off, easy to clean and DEFINITELY makes a difference. I never tried aerated/decanted wine before, but have done a few side by side tests and this definitely removes a LOT of the metallic aftertaste/tannis some wines have that make them unpleasant to drink. I'm a believer now
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I have a new best friend
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Makes red wine more enjoyable, as the "smoky" flavors tend to taste soapy to me (I can't be the only one here..). This was gorgeously packaged and came in two pieces to "assemble" if you can even call it that. The wine stopper is leak-free and the top keeps it from dripping red wine down the bottle onto your easily-stainable white countertops. Wonderful product that I'll easily be gifting to friends.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: leaks. useless!
customer_reviews.text: Leaks all over my counter. It leaks between the clear and black plastic. Contacted seller a few days ago and no word back yet.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfensteed

customer_reviews.title: Defective LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because most of the reviews seemed good and I wanted an aerator. I was a bit wary, as one review mentioned they received a defective product that leaked. My product is also leaking. It does not leak where it meets the bottle - it leaks where the spout meets the insertion gasket. Most of the wine ends up leaking through there and ending up on the counter, rather than the glass. I'm a little concerned if multiple people are receiving defective units - I'd happily keep it if it was functional, but that simply isn't the case. I will be returning mine in the next few days.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in this product. I saw reviews prior to making the purchase that the item was flimsy, but figured that was operator error. It was not: the product feel apart shortly after the 1st use and will not go back together correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Rohb Vogue

customer_reviews.title: Leaked badly within the first month!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly this aerator started leaking within first month! Since the aerator comes in two pieces here is no way to tighten it won’t leak Disappointed to waste $14.00 on this faulty design. Not recommended 😟
customer_reviews.author: Jonesy

customer_reviews.title: Leaks terribly!
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I didn't have a chance to use this before my return window closed otherwise I would have returned it. The Vintoro Wine Aerator leaks terribly. It leaks where the black plastic and the clear plastic meets so will be going in the trash shortly. Very disappointed in the quality (lack of) in this product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Wermers

customer_reviews.title: Leaking
customer_reviews.text: Worked good the first couple of times but then it started leaking. I returned it - disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Xristina.Ro

customer_reviews.title: It leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on the basis of all the positive reviews. Be careful when you clean and wash the unit. When you re-assemble it ensure that the small 3 holes on solid black piece are facing upward, not downward. If they are facing downward, which happened to us the first time we cleaned it, the next time you pour wine, the wine will drip out of the holes since they are facing downward. At first we thought this was a serious flaw. We posted a very negative review of 1 star. But now we realized the problem occurred in our reassembly. You should beware as well. .
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Papovich

customer_reviews.title: Leaks around joint
customer_reviews.text: The design includes a joint in the main body of the spout (at the junction between the clear and opaqe materials) which will not seal properly. There is no gasket or screw arrangement to prevent leakage - which you get in abundance.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It was inexpensive and easy to use. My husband bought me an electric one from Best Buy last year for $70 and it broke within months. By that point it was too late to return. This one isn’t bulky like that one was and you do not need any batteries. I really like the package so I can bring it with me on the go if needed. It’s very easy to clean and then I put it back in the cute package when I’m not using it. I purchased one for my aunt for Christmas. I will be telling my family and friends. Thanks so much for a reliable, easy to use and on the go product!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Reese

customer_reviews.title: " for lack of a better word. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think an aerator would really make that much of a difference, but we did a normal pour and a pour through this aerator and tried them side-by-side. What a difference!!! The flavor was much more pronounced... Fruit, chocolate, and espresso (It was a red blend). The normal pour had less flavor and was more "vinegary," for lack of a better word. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tex Burrito

customer_reviews.title: Give Your Wine Some Air!
customer_reviews.text: Does just what it says! The aeration of the wine, especially a young red, smooths out the wine and cuts excess acidity. My choice is to decanter the wine using the aerator. This adds another level of aeration and helps even an inexpensive wine taste great. I don't find it necessary to aerate a white wine but then again, I drink very little white wine. Try this with one of the better box wines like Black Box Can and you will notice a marked difference in taste and smoothness between right from the box and through the Vintoro
customer_reviews.author: Richard Vuillequez

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: A couple of things. We did a testing tonight and found that the aerator really does improve the taste of red wine. Frankly, I doubted, but no longer. Now, I quickly learned you do have to really tip the bottle over to make the wine swirl as it should to properly aerate - much more so than if you were pouring direct from the bottle. Additionally, on the practical side, you will have no drips; on the aesthetic side, it looks graceful. At this price point, it's hard to claim a nice aerator is too expensive to have on hand. If you like red wine, get an aerator!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Faith AdairTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Loved this aerator until the plastic cracked
customer_reviews.text: This aerator works fantastic-- effectively aerates the wine and improves the taste. We lightly used the product for 2 months then randomly found ourselves with wine soaked hands as it started leaking! We examined the pieces and found that the plastic top piece was no longer attached as the barely threaded attachment had cracked. Not sure how this could have happened as we were extremely cautious with use, gently rinsed after each use and allowed to air dry. I don't think we could have been much more careful with it, so I believe the plastic pouring piece is poorly made. I would recommend spending a bit more money for a better quality product that will last.
customer_reviews.author: TMR

customer_reviews.title: This thing really works!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Shiraz drinker, and as an old lady chicken farmer I enjoy my glass in the evening while cooking or putting my flock to bed. Trouble is, the decent Shiraz is expensive and the cheap stuff is so bad that it makes me cringe when I take a sip! So, I had good stuff when this aerator came, and it DID make it taste better. But then came the five dollar bottle, and I still don't believe it! This process really works! The cheap stuff is now good, and I can enjoy a glass every evening now! I should advertise for this thing! It's amazing! Easy to use, easy to clean, and it WORKS!
customer_reviews.author: Cinderella 111

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Priced right. Carefully you assemble with air holes on top instead of bottom.
customer_reviews.text: Priced right, built fairly well, and seems to make a marked improvement. My single gripe is that it’s possible to reassemble it incorrectly with the air intake holes pointing down which, when not paying attention, resulted in red wine all over my kitchen counter. That was my fault but the design could include a nub or something to prevent that possibility. Still give it 5 stars across the board.
customer_reviews.author: dc

customer_reviews.title: Good but broke after a short time
customer_reviews.text: First, I have to say that this wine aerator works extremely well. I have had a couple of these by different manufacturers, and each cracked in half where the spout joins the base. This happened to both of them after about two months of use. I washed each by hand, never in the dishwasher. So for the money I shy away from this design in particular. However, because it does work exceptionally well, I still give it 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M

customer_reviews.title: Converted to wine aerator believer!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to purchase this wine aerator after hearing from friends how good they work. Didn't think it would do that much, but alas, I am a new convert, WOW, my wife and I did a blind taste test, and it was unbelievable!! It really does change the flavor, and smoothed out the wine. I will forever be a wine aerator proponent from now on. The device seems to be well made, and the case is very handsome. I only wish it came with some kind of plug to seal the aerator until the next glass is poured. I guess I just have to drink faster!! Works well.
customer_reviews.author: EJMAMMO

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, it leaks when you pour
customer_reviews.text: I would love this, but after experiencing the first one I owned leaking out of the connection between the clear section and the black base (which screw together), I ordered a second, which also leaked. This happened after using the dishwasher to wash it for the first time. Perhaps you're not supposed to use the dishwasher? In any case, I've also ordered this one: ​ ... which is better and does not leak. I'm sad to have to leave a 2-star review- but this is why!
customer_reviews.author: Dan Nissenbaum

customer_reviews.title: Amazing aerator and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Best wine aerator I’ve every used! This was recommend from a friend and I can’t thank her enough. I was had ones hat leaked and you ended up having to wrap a paper towel around it to have a good pour and not make a mess. This is not that. THIS IS AMAZING! It never leaks or drips. It is so easy to take apart and clean too. It comes in a nice storage case which is great to keep it safe and to bring with you when you go out of town. I highly recommend this to anyone that loves wine. Even when you don’t need an aerator i still use it because it’s fun.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda W

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The clear part is plastic, not glass. It also separates from the black part easily. I was in the middle of pouring a glass of wine when it fell apart. I put it back together, no problem. It seemed to be okay. The next time I went to use it, it fell apart in my hand again. The tabs that hold it together had broken off. This is very cheaply made, and the flavor isn't as good as the last aerator I owned.
customer_reviews.author: J. West

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, broken and terrible product
customer_reviews.text: This wine aerator is so cheap and does not work. The wine just leaks right out of every gap in the aerator. As soon as I opened it and held it, I thought I was in trouble by how cheap it felt. And surely enough I tried using it a handful of times (each time re-tightening it) and every time the wine poured through every gap in the device. I've bought many hundreds of items from Amazon over the years and can truly say this is the single worst item I've ever purchased. I'll be contacting Amazon further to complain about how bad it is.
customer_reviews.author: Maximus

customer_reviews.title: A PERFECT POUR AND GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: Great Wine Aerator! Simple and elegant design. Does an excellent job aerating red wines as you pour. Doesn't leak! Doesn't leak! READ THE INSTRUCTIONS BEFORE TAKING IT APART TO CLEAN! There are little alignment marks to guide you for disassembly and reassembly. That being said - you shouldn't have to take this thing apart very often to clean it. A quick rinse at the end of the day or party and let it air dry. Love this product and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: HeBeGB

customer_reviews.title: Little device does a great job
customer_reviews.text: This is a really simple device to add to your wine bottle and it does a great job. We tasted a red that we’ve had before that DEFINITELY needed to be aerated in the past before and after the pourer and it makes a difference. No more trying to wait 20 mins or pouring the wine back and forth 15+ times to get the sharp tang to settle. We really like it and are glad that we bought this.
customer_reviews.author: WednesdayLA

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this a few months ago and it's been working great. You can definitely notice a difference in taste with aerating. My only gripe with the aerator is cleaning can be tricky. The past couple times I've washed it, the O-ring that seals the 2 main pieces together had fallen off. So be sure to keep an eye on it when washing. The last time I washed it, however, the O-ring had fallen into my sink. So I contacted Vintorio about a replacement piece. They emailed me back right away and shipped a new O-ring as well! Amazing customer service. Vivian was incredibly nice in assisting me. Will be back!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Perella

customer_reviews.title: Best aerator
customer_reviews.text: If you love wine then you definitely need this! I was a little skeptical about using an aerator but gave this product a shot. I am sure glad I did. Wife and I did a before and after taste test and we both agreed the wine tasted better using this aerator. To top it off, customer service from this company is top notch! They stand by their product. I had a slight problem of leakage and apparently there’s a clear washer that I must’ve thrown away during cleaning. Sent a message to the seller months later and they sent a whole replacement product same day! Definitely recommending this aerator to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Jason D

customer_reviews.title: Also great to travel with
customer_reviews.text: Multiple blind comparison tests done with friends, acquaintances, family members, wine aficionados, and barely-drinkers alike suggest that these aerators most certainly have at a bare minimum a modest positive impact on the wine. Pair this with a decanter and you're in business. Also great to travel with. But please don't bring this with you to a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: SRP

customer_reviews.title: It works !
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is, it works ! I am not a wine expert, but do enjoy wine on daily bases. I found out it works the best with wine ranging from $10 to $30, you save the breathing time , and the taste is so yummy! Like a flower bud turned into its full bloom. Plus, it’s very convenient to use. I had the kind that you have to hold it with one hand and pour you wine with the other, this is much easier to just pour and enjoy !
customer_reviews.author: Feliza Hsu

customer_reviews.title: Didn't know I needed one
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine encouraged me to get an aerator. I thought it would be a waste of money but purchased this one because the price was reasonable and it got good reviews. I didn't realize what I was missing by not having it. I have lots of wines at home and I definitely noticed the difference. It is easy to use and assemble and clean up was simple. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: writerdame

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and works
customer_reviews.text: The Pourer is very convenient. Just place in bottle and it works. The long steam is both a blessing and a curse. It helps with ensuring enough air is used to decant the wine and it easily comes off for easy cleaning. But it is long and I feel like I need to be careful that I don't break it or ruin the connection to the Pourer. The Pourer is easy to clean. The Pourer is tall and thus needs to come out if you do not finish the bottle and want to stick in the refrigerator. But frankly one should, and insert a cork and air evacuateor to attempt to maintain the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Roadwarrior

customer_reviews.title: Makes your wine taste smoother!
customer_reviews.text: This wine aerator certainly works. Without having to let your wine breathe, you can open a bottle, use this aerator, and enjoy your wine at its finest right away. Also, this aerator has a life time warranty. I had a problem, contacted the seller, and they immediately resolved the problem. I can't recommend this product or the seller any higher!
customer_reviews.author: Palm tree

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: This is my third aerator from Amazon and of the three it is by far the best. It is easy to clean, aerates my reds well, and so far I have yet to have any problems with it. The plastic construction may put some people off but it doesn’t take away from the function. I noticed in some other reviews that people complained of it breaking when opened. While I see how this is possible, as long as it is not brutally twisted or forced I can see the product lasting quite a while. The product customer service also seems to stand by their product which is great in a seller. I would buy this again and not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Adam W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Wine Aerator
customer_reviews.text: I love my new Vintorio WIne Aerator Pourer-It makes such a big difference in the taste of my Red Wine. Just seeing the bubbles as the wine filters though the aerator, is a clear sign that its filtering the wine tp [erfection Hearing from the company in regards to the aerator and proper usage, storage and cleaning has been very useful. And lifetime guarantee-you cannot beat this. Great Aerator!!!
customer_reviews.author: mbhall48

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I am NOT a wine expert but I can appreciate the benefits of good aeration. I have used it several times and it is so much better than the aerator I have been using. The wine literally froths as it is being poured. Add to that the ergonomics of the tilted spout and the very nice storage case that it comes with. Overall, I definitely am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: James T

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have it more than a couple weeks before the plastic piece broke making it unable to secure... Read some reviews and it looks like it happens quite often.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi Koenig

customer_reviews.title: Drink Better Wine
customer_reviews.text: Love this little aerator. Read a study on how someone took ordinary wines and aerated them in a blender before blind taste testing and blew people away. Don't love decanting, as I like to taste the wine blossom in the glass. This was a great addition for instant aeration straight into the glass with frothy bubbles that expand the universe of the wine. Even if it elevates your wine experience 5% its worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kam Sam

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer service
customer_reviews.text: Hate opening a new bottle of wine and waiting for it to breathe? Don't want to try pouring wine through the full size venturi and not to spill? You NEED this!! Simply uncork your bottle, pop this into the opening and go to town. It is small enough to travel with too. Their customer service is AWESOME! I took my Vintorio Wine Aerator Pourer on a girls weekend & someone disassembled it to clean it and accidently lost the silicone ring. When I contacted the company to inquire about purchasing a new ring, they sent me a WHOLE NEW POURER! If every company was this good at customer service, they could stop staffing their complaint departments. Thank you, Vintorio!!
customer_reviews.author: Stately

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Use and GREAT customer service!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing, not only does it preserve the bottle of wine over night without it spoiling, but it makes red wine taste better. My 5 stars is honestly because of the customer service I experienced with this company. After 2 months mine chipped on the plastic inside (probably my fault) so I reached out to customer service telling them I would send it back if they would replace it. They got back to me in the same day asking for my address, they were just going to ship me a new one. I really appreciated that! Awesome product and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Really opens up the taste of the wine
customer_reviews.text: The Vintorio is very easy to assemble and use. You do need to be careful twisting it to remove it from the wine bottle after using it - that can cause the bottom part to separate from the clear plastic top slightly and then it leaks. I've used it about a dozen times now and it has worked great! I have some other aeration devices and this is by far the easiest to use and really opens the taste of the wine.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great flavor....but leaks badly.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this product. But after the first few uses, it started leaking anytime I used it. I triple checked that the parts were put together correctly and that the seal was closed. But without fail now, every time, it leaks. The only reason I'm giving it 3 stars is because what wine does make it into the glass, tastes fantastic and I notice a difference. I will be investing in a better aerator in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Meehan

customer_reviews.title: Love it, and great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this. It aerates my wine as I pour it, and makes the pouring process simpler and neater (no more drips!). I've only had it about a week, but so far, it cleans well enough by rinsing between uses. Also, my first pourer leaked (between the clear and black pieces). I contacted Vivian in Customer Service, and she promptly helped me determine the issue (a missing gasket between the two pieces), and shipped me a new pourer. I'm very happy with the product function and quality, and the Customer Service!
customer_reviews.author: rjeiri

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use Wine Pourer
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my sister-in-law for Christmas and she liked it so I decided to buy another for myself to replace the one I owned (different brand) that was starting to get stained. As such I was looking for something that was easy to clean and didn't drip when pouring. So far this one seems to be doing well. It's larger than my previous one, especially with the long attachment, but it is much easier to clean and the spout doesn't drip when I lift after a pour. Overall a good product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Malone

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and clean; love the bubbles!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put in the wine bottle; super easy to clean. I've just been leaving it in the bottle until I finish it. (Um - that's about 2-1.2 days). I do find that I just pour a little bit of the wine in my glass, drink it and then pour a bit more into the glass. I really get the best flavor that way. I am please with my purchase and tend to treat it with kid gloves as I do not want to break it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: It leaks from the connection between the plastic nozzle and the black base that actually goes into the bottle. I have tried attaching the plastic top in both directions and in both wet and dry conditions. The leak persists in each of these configurations. Based on this experience I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS
customer_reviews.text: All I will say is BUY THIS IF YOU'RE A WINO! I bought one and guys this makes cheap store wine taste damn good. I just open the bottle, let the bottle sit for 5 minutes and then snap this aerator together (super easy btw), and pour a glass of wine. My parents live in California so they're big winos and they visited one time and my mom commented on this so I bought her one for Christmas. She uses it all of the time now! Definitely my go to when I need a gift for my wine lover friends.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Superior Concept
customer_reviews.text: This device is an engineering marvel as far as function. If you can remind yourself to be extra careful in all aspects of handling the delicate design, it should last. The aeration this produces exceeds the ability of aerating decanters. Easy clean when finished using- rinse with water, submerge in soapy water occasionally. Fair price for a quality aerator. Really opens up the wine flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Volcano King

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: My dad makes wine from kits as a hobby. His wine is usually pretty good. I got him Th is as a stocking stuffer for Christmas this year and we tried it out on one of his own bottles. It took his wine from good to AMAZING. We were blown away by the difference and how much character it gave the wine. Smartest thing I’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Dracollo

customer_reviews.title: I love this aerator
customer_reviews.text: This is a no-spill wine aerator which is excellent as wine seems to never self-contain. This turns mediocre wine into something quite palatable and much more enjoyable for sipping. It's super easy to pull apart and clean. I don't drink wine without using this. I wouldn't buy a different brand aerator. I want only this one from now on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fickling

customer_reviews.title: Started leaking after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: Product lasted about 2 weeks and then started leaking between the two parts that have to be screwed tighten. It’s not a few drops; you lose a lot of wine. Back to my Vinturi
customer_reviews.author: John Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This handy tool fits easily into your open wine bottle so it aerates the wine as you pour. Magic! It’s high quality and comes in a protective black storage box. And makes the wine even more delicious! I definitely prefer this aerator to ones that you have to pour the wine through. This is much easier since it fits right into the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Used one time, worked perfect. Second time: leaked heavily. Not so happy since 1.) the product was not so durable, 2.) was embarrasing to have my wine leak during a romantic date, destroyed the mood.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I used the aerator for the first time yesterday. It works great. Did a before and after taste test with a friend and we both agreed it kind of brought the wine to life. This will make a great gift for my wine loving friends and family. It comes in a really nice case to store it in.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Makes a big difference! I bought this because of the reviews, but mentioned buying it to my friends who consume a lot of wine, and they said they have three! I outed myself a glass without using the aerator, and then poured a glass with the aerator, and could immediately taste an improvised difference!
customer_reviews.author: Review Chick

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: So I got it very quickly nice box and much thicker than I thought it was going to be the glass that is and I open my bottle of wine tonight and wow five stars totally would buy it again and totally recommend it I am a poor person so I was really hoping that this would work and it did
customer_reviews.author: T. Leggett

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall this item is great for the price. I never really thought this would improve the taste of my wine but boy was I wrong. I can't really taste much difference when used on white wines and the reds are like a whole new wine after using this. The only thing I see as a mild issue is the ease of cleaning it. All I have been able to do is take it apart and run hot soapy water down through it. Nothing to really get down inside to clean it but then again that is just a mild issue.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Ok, I'm sold - Bought on a whim and love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on a whim and a chance after reading a few of the reviews. I love my red wines and appreciate the value of decanting when necessary. This little gadget made a huge difference in the red wines we tried it with. It was a lot of fun pouring glasses for the family, with and without and watching their reactions as we were all able to taste a measurable and enjoyable difference when we used it with the wines that we love to drink!
customer_reviews.author: ashrambler

customer_reviews.title: Improves taste of wine and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and works very well. Great idea. You just plug it in and pour. It seals very well and so far, I have had no leaks or drips. I have seen other brands where you have to hold the aerator with one hand and pour with the other hand. This eliminates that hassle and possible mess and spillage. Definitely makes a noticeable difference in the taste of the wine, especially noticeable with red wines. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Marks

customer_reviews.title: Get this Aerator Right Now...
customer_reviews.text: I have never used an aerator before. I never knew that I needed one but... wow! I can tell you that it will change your wine life!!!! If you want the best single cup coffee maker...get a Nespresso Vertuo. Life changing. If you want to enjoy a great glass of wine...get the Vintorio Wine Aerator Pourer. Equally life changing!!!! This little miracle can turn most any $10 bottle of red wine into a $40 experience. No joke. Not kidding. I am buying some more of these as Christmas/birthday presents for friends and family this year. Move your wine game to the next level and get this amazing little miracle today.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Skala

customer_reviews.title: Wrrks great
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace one that started to leak (different brand and design). I'm happy with it so far. It does not leak, it seems to aerate the wine nicely. Be careful how you orient the removable clear part. If you put it on the wrong way, you will have wine dripping out of the air holes when you pour.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: No more wine headache.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I heard this will help reduce headaches associated with red wine. It works. I’ve been using for a few months now and I haven’t had a headache yet! I used to get them bad even with one small glass of wine; expensive, cheap, it didn’t matter! This works wonders.
customer_reviews.author: P. HAYNES

customer_reviews.title: Great job at aerating wine
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased a half a dozen or so of these in the bottle stopper type aerators and they have all sucked. This one by far provides the most consistent and largest amount of aeration I have experienced. I tasted a noticeable difference when I used this product. The long black extension tube that goes in the bottle is fragile so make sure you either take it off when you put it back into a drawer or just take it off and not lose it.
customer_reviews.author: Lance P.

customer_reviews.title: The Warranty is for REAL
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful warranty service. After two months of use, upon reassembly after a cleaning, we dropped the spout onto a tile floor. Must have landed on the fastening clip as it was gone when we picked it up. My bad. A month later I ran into original box and saw the lifetime warranty. So I contacted the seller and they expedited a replacement unit. Wow, what great service for a failure caused by my misuse.
customer_reviews.author: Iceman218

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better customer service!
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and love the customer service from this company! After placing my order, I received a personal email from the owner, Victor, offering availability if I had any questions about the product. After it arrived, I received another email from Vivian checking in. I used my aerator last evening and could definitely taste the difference in my wine! Highly recommend the product and company!
customer_reviews.author: JMarie3

customer_reviews.title: Based on the good reviews I decided to buy
customer_reviews.text: Based on the good reviews I decided to buy, but when I received it is poorly made and leaks all over. It is cheap plastic and probably cost them .25 cents to make as it has so many flaws just by looking at it. WOW.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: While at my grocery, I had a taste of wine. I noticed the aerator being used and was interested in the workings and results of the item. I am so glad I wad able to find one. I love the convenience of not having to aeriate the whole bottle for a glass of wine. The assembly and cleansing is easy and more importantly, it does a wonderful job of aeration to the wine. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: LMH1917

customer_reviews.title: Works great until the plastic threads break
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, does indeed improve the flavor of wines - especially the red types. Easy to use. The two pieces connect together with a seal in between - and this is the weak point of the device. The clear plastic thread cleats broke on my unit - there are only 2 cleats, so when one goes, there no longer is a proper seal. That beautiful wine spills out making a mess of the countertop.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Delozier

customer_reviews.title: my wife loved it too
customer_reviews.text: Really does make a difference in the flavor, my wife loved it too! Following up on our previous review.. Have been using this several times a week for the last 1.5 years and still love it! Last night I discovered that the tabs between the bottom and top of the aerator had broken, I contacted Vintorio and they have already responded and are sending a replacement. Great product, and great customer service.. I think I will be buying another one just to support them! Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sparky642

customer_reviews.title: Great Wine Purer
customer_reviews.text: So far this wine purer has been amazing. It adds a ton of oxygen to the wine and adds so much flavor to the wine. It is easy to clean, just be careful when taking it apart so it doesn't break. It is super easy to clean. Make sure you register your product online, it has a 100% warranty on it if you register it. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Eden

customer_reviews.title: We love this aerator!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this aerator but were disappointed that it leaked. I emailed the company directly and within a day had a response from Vivian. All she needed was my Amazon order #, and within a week I got my new replacement and it does not leak at all!!! Very happy with the product and its customer service. May order another one!!
customer_reviews.author: jhuffster

customer_reviews.title: For the impatient wine drinker.... this is IT!
customer_reviews.text: No patience for letting that great wine breathe? No worries, this easy to assemble aerator is ready instantly. At first I was intimidated by "Assembly Instructions" and that it had "parts." No big deal. Easy-peasy and wine flows through easily and quickly. Instant smile. My last aerator stained, but not Vintorio! Easy to clean, store and put together.
customer_reviews.author: Gurleymon

customer_reviews.title: REALLY WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when my husband told me about this wine aerator. He researched it and found this on Amazon. It really does help the wine taste much smoother and less bitter. Sorry for my lack of wine lingo, but it makes relatively cheap questionable wine taste smoother and less alcoholly (is that a word?! Lol!)
customer_reviews.author: KonaKaiKai808

customer_reviews.title: Quiet Aerator
customer_reviews.text: This aerator is very easy to use and makes a great seal. It's got a ton of surface area and was surprisingly very quiet and easy to rinse. My aerator test is always Beaujolais Nouvea, so I pulled out a fresh bottle of 2019 and tried it out. It's not a complex wine, but it does typically open over time and I didn't find that with this aerator. The flavor remained, which tells me it's a high-quality wine product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Great aerator with a fatal flaw
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this aerator in January of 2019. It does a great job of aerating the wine. Cleanup is easy as it separates in half. However this is its Achilles heel. To reassemble you must line up markings on each half and twist. Most of the time the aerator leaks after reassembly. I'm only able to use it over a kitchen counter to avoid staining our eating table. It would be a great device if only they could figure out how to make it leak proof.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey M. Wolfson

customer_reviews.title: Breaks
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for a few months, I have cleaned it and used it according to the directions. The plastic is breaking and now the product dosent work. The paperwork says it has a lifetime warranty.... How do I cash in on that?
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Crouse

customer_reviews.title: for keeping in touch after our purchase with tips as to how to better utilize the Vintorio
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Victor, CEO and Founder, for keeping in touch after our purchase with tips as to how to better utilize the Vintorio. My wife and I are thrilled with the results. As a beginning test we tried on a $3.50 bottle of Pinot Noir. Tested right out of bottle, then after using Vintorio. WOW, completely softened the texture and flavor, taking the bite out...we are believers. Since our initial test, Vintorio has been used many times on more expensive reds and one white with fantastic results. Shipping, delivery and aerator have been as promised and spot on, thank you. JIm & Linda Gill
customer_reviews.author: Jim Gill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We use this more than our Menu Winebreather Carafe (which is awesome). I like not having to clean the breathers and simply rinse these out! Opens the wine very well. If you are drinking a big Napa cab I push it through this and let it stand for 10-15 minutes in the glass and most all of them are opened nicely. Very good purchase and you can't beat the price and space that it consumes as opposed to a carafe.
customer_reviews.author: Martin L. Mathews

customer_reviews.title: Takes a mediocre bottle and elevates it so easily
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, easy to clean and can take a mediocre bottle of wine and elevate it into something very nice. I like this product so much I’ve bought a total of 5 of them, so I have one everywhere I go. Plus I have given them as gifts to all my wine family members.
customer_reviews.author: KRC

customer_reviews.title: Vintorio Wine Aerator well crafted and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very easy to use and well crafted aerator. I have used the type that looks like a christmas ornaments but you have to really tilt that device The Vintorio Wine Aerator gives an easy pour without excessive tilting.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J Mott

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this aerator. We cleaned it immediately as the packaging suggested put it back together, however when we attempted to use it it was leaking from a seam. I thought perhaps I put it back together incorrectly so I disassembled and retried. upon inspection after our third try we noticed a significant gap in the seam. The rubber spacer was there the piece just didn't seem to be a perfect fit. So we are returning it and will continue to try and find one that doesn't leak.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good aerator
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say, this worked better than I expected. For me, aeration is best done in a decanter. But this little gadget is fun to pour and watch the spout mix air with the wine. It's not gimmicky/ I use it regularly now. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: John Q Public

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Absolutely amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Completely impressed with the communication from the company. Before I even got the product, I was emailed twice with tips and overall customer service. They stand behind their product as they should, because it's a good one! I was thoroughly impressed with the quality and the suggestions were SPOT ON!! I've already recommended this to several friends, 2 of which have added to their carts already. Great job guys! Way to be in business!
customer_reviews.author: S. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Arrived defective
customer_reviews.text: The seam between the black rubber part and the clear plastic leaks badly. We experimented with it for a while to make sure that we were using it properly. We are, it is just defective. Judging from other reviews this is a common occurence. It would work beautifully if it sealed together properly, but it arrived defective. It is very disappointing that they would even sell this with such a high rate of defects. Don't buy it. Find a more reliable aerator.
customer_reviews.author: Clammy C

customer_reviews.title: I hate it.
customer_reviews.text: I hate this thing. It raises my blood pressure every time I use it. I've since thrown it in the garbage. It leaks like crazy. They have special instructions as to how to prevent the leaks, however, if it's not lined up precisely, it'll leak all over the place and kill your buzz. Why is this even a thing? It's stupid AF.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Langbehn

customer_reviews.title: Great aerator
customer_reviews.text: Bought this wine aerator because my other one broke in an accident. I love the design of this one and find that it is much different than my previous one, but in a good way. My previous one was pretty basic, but this one is pretty intricate by comparison because of the extra pieces and design in general. This one is worth a purchase if you're looking for a aerator.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I make my own wine in the basement for my own consumption and as gifts to the neighbors and it's quite decent, and called "Surprisingly Good Cellars". This nifty device noticeable improves the flavor. I recommend. Dropped it and broke off the spout, a little Gorilla glue and back in business!
customer_reviews.author: Richard London

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap. Leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a week ago and it worked for a few bottles of wine and seemed to work well (though it is a bit awkward to use and pour from) - then it started leaking everywhere (for several bottles in a row). There are three pieces that feel like cheap plastic and do not fit together well. Given the positive reviews, I Thought I would try this first before purchasing a more expensive aerator - it is now in the recycling bin and I have ordered that more expensive aerator. Seems to be a great idea not so well executed.
customer_reviews.author: J. N. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Will leak
customer_reviews.text: Clear pour spout and the black wine opener stopper do not have a good connectivity. So naturally, this lead to leakage. I often use my aerator and unfortunately, after a few months, the top and bottom just no longer locked together. Now, it will leak on the side, and make a mess. I got mine from Costco and will definitely be returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: @lonzojavi

customer_reviews.title: Love at first sip
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I lived without this aerator for so long! It helps flavor open up quickly, good wine becomes even better and you don't have to sit and wait for it to air out. Couple times made a mistake of buying not so good of a wine and this little thing saved the day! Easy to clean with just running warm water as long as you do it right after you are done using it.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile purchase
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very pleased with this purchase. Definitely makes the wine flavor better. After reading other reviews I purchased this. I have had to super glue it because it kept coming apart but it still works great :) I would buy anther if I need to. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Featherb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these several weeks back. It was flimsy and broke almost immediately. I wrote a negative review and the President of the Company emailed me, apologized and theorized that I had just gotten a defective product. He immediately replaced it without requiring that I send the broken one back. He was correct. Their replacement is wonderful-performs very well. I am impressed by the company's customer service as well. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: BigFisch

customer_reviews.title: and I can honeslty say I'm not disappointed! You can pour a bottle straight after opening ...
customer_reviews.text: I drink wine frequently and finally decided to purchase an aerator. I opted for the Vintorio, and I can honeslty say I'm not disappointed! You can pour a bottle straight after opening and it still tastes WAY better than letting it breathe for an hour, plus swirling for additional aeration. I thought these things were mostly a pitch, but as a frequent wine drinker, I can honestly say that this one is totally worth the money. Oh, and as an added bonus, it doesn't spill a single drop, as advertised! No more wiping the bottle after pours. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jack kileen

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After using 4 times it broke!! I wash as directed and to put it back the pouring spout will not reconnect properly Vet Disappointed Wish I could send back for replacement to give it another try. 😒
customer_reviews.author: Irises1108

customer_reviews.title: Made my wine DELICIOUS - but is already defective!
customer_reviews.text: This aerator made my wine taste significantly better!! Unfortunately I’ve only used it once, and now there is a leak between the aerator and the spout. It seems the rubber seal won’t let it close all the way. Wondering how to get a replacement, because it really is a great product. Edited - I contacted Vintorio through their website and was contacted back within a day. They helped me troubleshoot the pourer and it seems to be working well now. Good to know they have excellent customer service in case it is ever truly defective!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Boyle

customer_reviews.title: The best pourer/aerator we have ever used
customer_reviews.text: The best pourer/aerator we have ever used. We keep two at home and one in the camper. And the lifetime warranty? No joke. Even if you misplace the O-ring that fits between the two pieces, the company will send you a new one. No charge. DANG. We love these for our red wine... get a few of them as they also do quite well for short term storage (overnight... wine doesn't last any longer than that in our house!) :)
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Terrible..it leaks when you pour..Wasted my expensive wines,as they would leak while pouring.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible..it leaks when you pour..Wasted my expensive wines,as they would leak while pouring. Tried the first time with a bottle and it leaked. Read the instructions again and tried it with the 2nd bottle leaked again. So disappointed.
